response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,500. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique value it will bring to your life or business. I understand that this might be slightly above your initial budget, but I assure you, investing in this product will provide significant returns on your investment. Let's discuss how we can make this deal happen.", "product_price": 12500}
